{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Sprayduck |image = [[File:Sprayduck_New.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Sprayduck''. |dex = 60 |effect = Makes your [[Berries]] grow faster }} The '''Sprayduck''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the speed at which [[Berries]] grow in the [[Farm]]. The Sprayduck is unlocked after catching 60 unique Pok√©mon. == Details == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || x1.25 Growth Speed || 500 Berry harvest Experience || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || x1.3 Growth Speed || 500 Berry harvest Experience || style="text-align:right" | 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || x1.35 Growth Speed || 1500 Berry harvest Experience || style="text-align:right" | 250,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || x1.4 Growth Speed || 2500 Berry harvest Experience || style="text-align:right" | 500,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || x1.45 Growth Speed || 5000 Berry harvest Experience || style="text-align:right" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || x1.5 Growth Speed || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |} == Berries harvest Experience == All values are rounded up. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! {{Infobox Oak Item |name = Sprayduck |image = [[File:Sprayduck_New.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Sprayduck''. |dex = 60 |effect = Makes your [[Berries]] grow faster }} The '''Sprayduck''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the speed at which [[Berries]] grow in the [[Farm]]. The Sprayduck is unlocked after catching 60 unique Pok√©mon. == Details == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !!
